desc: Youth guides to entering adult life and the workforce. Mentoring Guides. Workforce Skills. Finances for Independent Living. Homeschool curriculum for teens and adolescents. Adult transition. Life planning for teens.

layout.text: How well prepared for adult life is your teen?
Smart Transitions Guides from the Together We Can  Foundation are a great way to introduce important ideas about planning and being prepared for adult life, work, and managing money.
